## TidyTuesday
  
TidyTuesday is a weekly social data project in R - hosted by the [R4DS Online Learning Community](https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday). The intent of Tidy Tuesday is to provide a safe community to practice your wrangling and data visualization skills. I am a regular contributor and all of my  visualization are created solely using `{ggplot2}` and other extension packages. 


All of my contributions + code can be found [here](https://github.com/Ijeamakaanyene/tidytuesday).
